description: Numbers n such that 4n-1 and 4n+1 are both primes.
links: Zak Seidov, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: 3 belongs to the sequence because 4*3+1 and 4*3-1 are both primes.
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..2000] | IsPrime(4*n+1) and IsPrime(4*n-1)] [From Vincenzo Librandi, Nov 18 2010]
author: _Felice Russo_
